roleset.name: (cause to) adhere to, or put somewhere
roleset.note: STICK-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls spray-9.7-1, poke-19, shake-22.3-2, put-9.1-2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from stick.01-v)

example.name: ergative, no other args
example.text: The big questions are whether the increase, effective Jan. 1, 1990, will stick, and whether other major steelmakers will follow suit.

example.name: add stuck-to
example.text: Mr. Schneider of Bear Stearns says he is recalculating the worth of the company's assets and, in the meantime, is sticking to his ``buy'' recommendation on the belief that he will find ``values'' of 30 a share.
example.arg: on the belief that he will find ``values'' of 30 a share

example.name: with agent
example.text: John carefully stuck postage stamps to every square inch of his body.
example.arg: to every square inch of his body

example.name: more insert than adhere
example.text: [*] Stick some money in an interest-bearing account and watch it grow.

example.name: placement or movementwebt
example.text: But *PRO* do n't stick up your nose ; for the time being we 're not talking about the relationship between capital and profit .

example.name: aggressive sticking
example.text: ``I sense that [some people]-1 are reluctant *trace*-1 to stick their necks out in any aggressive way until after the figures come out,'' said Richard Eakle, president of Eakle Associates, Fair Haven, Conn.
example.arg: until after the figures come out

roleset.name: stick around: continue to be in a location, hang out

example.name: this is what it looks like
example.src: this is what it looks like
example.type: this is what it looks like
example.text: And defense lawyers are warning that they won't stick around if they don't get paid.

roleset.name: stick up: defend
roleset.note: STICK_UP-V NOTES: No VNcls. FN not applicable to this sense. (from stick.04-v)

example.name: stick up for your rights
example.text: Supporters of index arbitrage haven't been publicly sticking up for the trading strategy, as some did during the post-crash outcry of 1987.
example.arg: as some did during the post-crash outcry of 1987
